Don't Punish Schools for Uncontrolled Pandemics Act of 2020
A bill to prohibit in-person instructional requirements during the COVID-19 emergency.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Don't Punish Schools for Uncontrolled Pandemics Act of 2020
This bill prohibits the Department of Education from requiring a local school program to conduct in-person instruction during the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) emergency.
